name: A Bright Hallway
description:
You are in a long well lit hallway leading east and west.  The walls
here are a milky white colour, and glow with a warm luminescence, as does
the floor.  A feeling of goodness permeates the area, and you feel unworthy
to tread upon these sacred floors.
   A huge set of double doors in finely worked ivory can be seen to the
west.

exits.keywords: door ivory~ 1 -1 2667 S #2667 An Antechamber~    You are in a small antechamber.  It is well lit here, though the source of light cannot be seen.  It is almost as if the room itself exudes a warm glow of goodness.  A larger chamber can be seen to the west, but you do not feel worthy to pass into it.
